definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: These are musicians on the floats playing the "Welcome spring music" at the Flower Festival.
sentences.chinese: 这是花节上的乐手在彩车上演奏“迎春曲”。

sentences.english: Here, a female floats through a cloud forest in Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 这里，一只雌性的彩车通过云层森林在哥斯达黎加。

sentences.english: There is a bandwagon pulling out and the leader has to get people to climb on.
sentences.chinese: 乐队彩车要出发了，领导者必须让人们爬上去。

sentences.english: This has additional floats both sides and good stability.
sentences.chinese: 这是额外彩车两侧和良好的稳定性。

definition: honor guard/guard of honor/the banner bearing contingent leading a military procession
(of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
wedding car/carriage for collecting the bride
festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
to be decorated with lanterns and colored banners (idiom)
